KITTITAS WEATHER

City Council

Kittitas City Council

City Council meetings are generally held the second an fourth Tuesdays of every month starting at 6:00pm. Special meetings and study sessions are scheduled as needed. The public is invited to attend these meetings. Transcripts of City Council meetings may be found here .

Council Chambers, Kittitas City Hall - 207 North Main Street
